Dialogue.Page: Hey, it’s you!
Slate said you’re blasting off in your ship today. I’m really excited to see the launch!
Aren’t you gonna go into space? Aren’t you? You better not have changed your mind!

DialogueOption.Text: I want to practice with a pro before I leave.
I hear you and Slate beefed up the model ship. Can I see it?
Hey Mica, what's with the crack on the front of the model ship?
Mica, did you crash the model ship into the Nomai door in the large crater mountain?

Dialogue.Page: U-uh.
Just crashed it a bit too hard on the Attlerock, y'know! Wanted to give Esker a good scare.
Aw, gosh darn it. Nothing gets past you!
Promise you won't tell Slate! Please..? I was just a little curious what was inside that big locked door!
Slate already helped fix the model ship up, see? It's almost as good as new.. He doesn't have to ever know about it!

DialogueOptionsList.DialogueOption: Don't worry, your secret's safe with me. ModelRocketKid Caught End1
Hah, don't worry! I'm about to go crash my ship into the door too. ModelRocketKid Caught End2
Honesty is the best virtue. We must respect our elders and be truthful, Mica. ModelRocketKid Caught End3

Dialogue.Page: I knew you were the always the best.
Thanks, astronaut. I'm gonna wish you a bunch of good luck on your travels!
Wait, for real?!
You're the coolest, astronaut! Go knock it down for all of us!
No! Not honesty!
If you tell him, I'll.. I'll just tell Slate you were the one that told me to do it!
It's my word against yours - and I'm the better liar!
You better be! It’s been forever since anyone launched into space. I really, really want to see it.
Really bad.
Hey, you want to try out my model ship? Slate says it’s just like the real thing, only less likely to start a fire.
Aww, you’re just saying that. ...But if you really want to practice with me, I guess I could help you out a little.
Yeah, we recalibrated the controls and installed better thrusters. Want to give it a test drive? Slate says it’s just like the real thing, only less likely to start a fire.
Try to land on one of the <color=orange>geyser pools</color>. Show me what you’ve got!
Wow, that was just like the time the external fuel tanks exploded on reentry!
You’ll... you’ll be okay flying the big one, right?
What a landing! I guess that’s why Slate lets you fly the real thing, huh?
Someday, I want to design a ship that goes even faster than the ones Slate makes!
Slate says they think I can do it. And Gossan says I should ask Slate to be my first test pilot.
